iKON, Berjuang Keras Raih Kesempatan
01 Nov 2019, 23:47 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


iKON dalam penampilan di upacara penutupan Asian Games di GBK Jakarta pada Februari lalu. (CNN Indonesia/ Hesti Rika)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Tahun ini, iKON berusia empat tahun. Boyband bentukan YG Entertainment itu debut pada 15 September 2015 dengan lagu My Type. Dalam waktu 24 jam, video musik My Type meraih 1,7 penonton.Selang beberapa hari, lagu tersebut menduduki posisi pertama di chart MBC Music Core. Raihan tersebut didapat bahkan sebelum IKON memulai debut di atas panggung. Maka tak heran jika iKON lantas melenggang menyongsong kesuksesan.Di awal perjalanan, B.I, Bobby, Jinhwan, Junhoe, Donghyuk, dan Yunhyeong yang tergabung sebagai Team B di program Mnet WIN: Who is NEXT telah mengecap pengalaman pahit ketika kalah dari Team A. Kedua tim itu bersaing memperebutkan kesempatan untuk debut di bawah payung YG Entertainment. Kelak, Team A debut dengan menyandang nama WINNER. Sementara Team B mendapat peluang kedua dalam program Mix & Match, di mana B.I, Bobby, dan Jinhwan resmi digabungkan dalam sebuah grup baru. Akhirnya, iKON terbentuk beranggotakan B.I, Bobby, Jinhwan, Yunhyeong, Donghyuk, Ju-ne, dan Chanwoo. Pada 2016 mereka debut di Jepang dengan melepas album Welcome Back. Percaya diri, mereka menjalani tur konser bertajuk iKoncert 2016: Showtime Tour mulai Januari 2016, tampil di delapan negara dan mendapat sambutan hangat.Tahun 2017 menjadi puncak ketenaran iKON. Mereka sempat menggelar tur konser di 22 tempat di delapan kota besar Jepang. Album kedua, Return dirilis pada Januari 2018. Kali ini iKON telah memiliki fandom kuat, sehingga 12 materi di dalam Return langsung melejit di berbagai tangga lagu.Semua terlihat baik-baik saja untuk iKON, sampai kemudian Kim Han-bin alias B.I mengundurkan diri pada Juni 2019. Ia meletakkan 'jabatan' sebagai member dan leader iKON usai terseret kasus narkoba.


Kim Han-bin alias B.I, mengundurkan diri dari iKON setelah terseret kasus narkoba pada Juni 2019. (screenshot via Instagram/@shxxbi131)

B.I terbukti pernah mencoba untuk membeli narkoba dan berkebalikan dengan pernyataan agensi saat itu, ia mengakuinya. B.I mengundurkan diri sebagai bentuk pertanggungjawaban.Kini, iKON menyisakan Bobby, Chanwoo, Donghyuk, Junhoe, Jinhwan, dan Yunhyeong. Pada Sabtu (2/11) di Helipad Parking Ground Senayan, untuk pertama kalinya iKON akan tampil di depan iKONIK Indonesia dalam formasi enam member. Sejauh ini, iKON telah merilis dua mini album, New Kids: Continue dan New Kids: The Final, dua album berbahasa Korea, Welcome Back dan Return, serta satu dalam bahasa Jepang New Kids. Karya terbaru mereka adalah I'm OK yang diedarkan pada Januari lalu.

iKON, Striving to Win Opportunities
01 Nov 2019, 23:47 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


iKON was performing at the closing ceremony of the Asian Games at GBK Jakarta in February. (CNN Indonesia / Hesti Rika)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - This year, iKON is four years old. YG Entertainment's boy band formed on September 15, 2015 with the song My Type. Within 24 hours, My Type's music video reached 1.7 viewers. A few days later, the song took first place on the MBC Music Core chart. These achievements were obtained even before IKON debuted on the stage. So no wonder if iKON then sauntered towards success. At the beginning of the trip, BI, Bobby, Jinhwan, Junhoe, Donghyuk, and Yunhyeong who joined as Team B in the Mnet WIN program: Who is NEXT had tasted the bitter experience when losing to Team A. Second the team competed for the opportunity to debut under the umbrella of YG Entertainment. Later, Team A debuted with the name WINNER. While Team B got the second chance in the Mix & Match program, where B.I, Bobby, and Jinhwan officially merged into a new group. Finally, iKON was formed with members of B.I, Bobby, Jinhwan, Yunhyeong, Donghyuk, Ju-ne, and Chanwoo. In 2016 they debuted in Japan by releasing the album Welcome Back. Confident, they went on a concert tour titled iKoncert 2016: Showtime Tour began in January 2016, performed in eight countries and received a warm reception. The year 2017 became the peak of iKON's fame. They had held a concert tour in 22 places in eight major cities of Japan. The second album, Return was released in January 2018. This time iKON already has a strong fandom, so that 12 material in the Return immediately skyrocketed on various charts. Everything looks fine for iKON, until then Kim Han-bin aka BI resigned on June 2019. He placed his 'position' as a member and leader of iKON after being dragged into a drug case.


Kim Han-bin alias B.I, resigned from iKON after being dragged into a drug case in June 2019. (screenshot via Instagram / @ shxxbi131)

B.I was proven to have tried to buy drugs and contrary to the agency's statement at the time, he admitted. B.I resigns as a form of accountability. Today, iKON leaves Bobby, Chanwoo, Donghyuk, Junhoe, Jinhwan, and Yunhyeong. On Saturday (2/11) at the Senayan Parking Ground Helipad, iKON will perform for the first time in front of iKONIK Indonesia in a six-member formation. So far, iKON has released two mini albums, New Kids: Continue and New Kids: The Final, two Korean-language albums, Welcome Back and Return, and one in Japanese New Kids. Their latest work is I'm OK which was released last January.
